block.p: Podcast: Scheduled to appear this week are the translator Edith Grossman; Dave Itzkoff on science fiction in translation; and Joel Agee on Elfriede Jelinek. Dwight Garner, senior editor, is the guest host.
First Chapters: Excerpts from ''The Story of the Cannibal Woman,'' by Maryse Condé; ''Grotesque,'' by Natsuo Kirino; and other books.
